abstract: The company will significantly expand its Print Ads program, in which advertisers purchase ads in newspapers through the Web.
snippet: The company will significantly expand its Print Ads program, in which advertisers purchase ads in newspapers through the Web.
lead_paragraph: NEWSPAPERS reeling from major losses of advertising revenue to the Internet are getting a lift from the company that helped lure advertisers away: Google.

headline.main: Google to Expand Program, Giving Newspapers a Lift
headline.print_headline: Google to Expand Program, Giving Newspapers a Lift

abstract: Peter Norvig, the head of Google’s research unit, talks of its efforts to develop speech recognition technology for use in both mobile phone services and to search through the contents of video.
snippet: Peter Norvig, the head of Google’s research unit, talks of its efforts to develop speech recognition technology for use in both mobile phone services and to search through the contents of video.
lead_paragraph: Mobile is one of Google’s top research priorities, according to Peter Norvig, Google’s director of research, in an interview in MIT’s Technology Review.
